languages.text: "Это все... не слишком известное мне пространство. Моя жизнь — служба, и на службе я куда чаще задаюсь вопросом "виновен ли этот человек", чем вопросом "как я отношусь к этому человеку". Я впервые испытываю к кому-то подобную тягу, так что прошу простить за неопытность".

"I am... a little out of my depth here. My life has been one of service, and, in my line of duty, I am more frequently faced with the question of a person's guilt than with my feelings toward them. This is the first time I have felt drawn to anyone like this, so, I hope you can forgive my inexperience."
languages.original_text: "Это все... не слишком известное мне пространство. Моя жизнь — служба, и на службе я куда чаще задаюсь вопросом "виновен ли этот человек", чем вопросом "как я отношусь к этому человеку". Я впервые испытываю к кому-то подобную тягу, так что прошу простить за неопытность".

This is the first time I have felt drawn to anyone like this, so, I hope you can forgive my inexperience."

languages.text: 「…正直に言えば、私には少し荷が重いです。これまでの人生は、ひたすら奉仕と職務に捧げてきました。任務では、誰かに対して『どう感じるか』よりも、『その者に罪があるかどうか』を問われることの方が多かった。こんなふうに誰かに心を引かれるのは、これが初めてなんです。だから…未熟な点はどうか許してほしい」
languages.original_text: "I am... a little out of my depth here. My life has been one of service, and, in my line of duty, I am more frequently faced with the question of a person's guilt than with my feelings toward them. This is the first time I have felt drawn to anyone like this, so, I hope you can forgive my inexperience."

traits.locale_text: 「…正直に言えば、私には少し荷が重いです。これまでの人生は、ひたすら奉仕と職務に捧げてきました。任務では、誰かに対して『どう感じるか』よりも、『その者に罪があるかどうか』を問われることの方が多かった。こんなふうに誰かに心を引かれるのは、これが初めてなんです。だから…未熟な点はどうか許してほしい」

languages.text: "Ich ... bewege mich hier etwas außerhalb vertrauter Gefilde. Mein Leben war immer vom Dienst bestimmt, und in meinem Beruf geht es meist um die Schuld einer Person und nicht um meine Gefühle für sie. Ich fühle mich zum ersten Mal in dieser Weise zu jemandem hingezogen und kann nur hoffen, dass Ihr meine mangelnde Erfahrung verzeiht."
languages.original_text: "I am... a little out of my depth here. My life has been one of service, and, in my line of duty, I am more frequently faced with the question of a person's guilt than with my feelings toward them. This is the first time I have felt drawn to anyone like this, so, I hope you can forgive my inexperience."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... bewege mich hier etwas außerhalb vertrauter Gefilde. Mein Leben war immer vom Dienst bestimmt, und in meinem Beruf geht es meist um die Schuld einer Person und nicht um meine Gefühle für sie. Ich fühle mich zum ersten Mal in dieser Weise zu jemandem hingezogen und kann nur hoffen, dass Ihr meine mangelnde Erfahrung verzeiht."

languages.text: « Je vous avoue que je suis... quelque peu dérouté. J'ai consacré ma vie à mon devoir et, au cours de ma carrière, j'ai eu plus souvent l'occasion de me questionner sur la culpabilité des gens que sur mes sentiments à leur encontre. C'est la première fois que je ressens une telle attirance et j'espère que vous excuserez mon manque d'expérience. »
languages.original_text: "I am... a little out of my depth here. My life has been one of service, and, in my line of duty, I am more frequently faced with the question of a person's guilt than with my feelings toward them. This is the first time I have felt drawn to anyone like this, so, I hope you can forgive my inexperience."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous avoue que je suis... quelque peu dérouté. J'ai consacré ma vie à mon devoir et, au cours de ma carrière, j'ai eu plus souvent l'occasion de me questionner sur la culpabilité des gens que sur mes sentiments à leur encontre. C'est la première fois que je ressens une telle attirance et j'espère que vous excuserez mon manque d'expérience. »

languages.text: «Estoy... fuera de mi elemento. He vivido siempre al servicio de la justicia, y en mi oficio me enfrento con más frecuencia a la culpabilidad o inocencia de una persona que a mis sentimientos hacia ella. Es la primera vez que me siento tan atraído por alguien; confío que sepa perdonar mi falta de experiencia».
languages.original_text: "I am... a little out of my depth here. My life has been one of service, and, in my line of duty, I am more frequently faced with the question of a person's guilt than with my feelings toward them. This is the first time I have felt drawn to anyone like this, so, I hope you can forgive my inexperience."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy... fuera de mi elemento. He vivido siempre al servicio de la justicia, y en mi oficio me enfrento con más frecuencia a la culpabilidad o inocencia de una persona que a mis sentimientos hacia ella. Es la primera vez que me siento tan atraído por alguien; confío que sepa perdonar mi falta de experiencia».

languages.text: “这……这有点触及到了我的盲点。我的一生都在侍奉帝国律法，在我的职责范围内，我很擅长判断某个人是否有罪，但我从来没思考过对他人的感情。这还是我第一次被其他人吸引，所以，希望你能原谅我经验不足。”
languages.original_text: "I am... a little out of my depth here. My life has been one of service, and, in my line of duty, I am more frequently faced with the question of a person's guilt than with my feelings toward them. This is the first time I have felt drawn to anyone like this, so, I hope you can forgive my inexperience."

traits.locale_text: “这……这有点触及到了我的盲点。我的一生都在侍奉帝国律法，在我的职责范围内，我很擅长判断某个人是否有罪，但我从来没思考过对他人的感情。这还是我第一次被其他人吸引，所以，希望你能原谅我经验不足。”

languages.text: "Ben... Bu konuda biraz acemiyim. Hayatım hizmet etmekle geçti. Görevim gereği bir kişiye karşı olan hislerim yerine bu kişinin suçlu olup olmadığı sorusuyla daha sık karşılaşıyorum. Birine karşı ilk kez böyle bir çekim hissediyorum, bu yüzden umarım deneyimsizliğimi mazur görürsün."
languages.original_text: "I am... a little out of my depth here. My life has been one of service, and, in my line of duty, I am more frequently faced with the question of a person's guilt than with my feelings toward them. This is the first time I have felt drawn to anyone like this, so, I hope you can forgive my inexperience."

traits.locale_text: "Ben... Bu konuda biraz acemiyim. Hayatım hizmet etmekle geçti ve görevim gereği, bir kişiye karşı olan hislerim yerinde bu kişinin suçlu olup olmadığı sorusuyla daha sık karşılaşıyorum. Birine karşı ilk kez böyle bir çekim hissediyorum, bu yüzden umarım deneyimsizliğimi mazur görürsün."
